title: Pluralsight - Introduction to the Junos OS
description:
Introduction to the Junos OS
===================================

An introduction to Juniper Networks' Junos Operating System.

Authored by: Robert Juric
Duration: 3h 39m
Level: Intermediate
Released: 12/3/2013

This course will cover the topics necessary to begin working on any Junos device, from initial configuration steps to troubleshooting commands. 
Robert Juric is a network engineer with a focus on interoperability, security, and proper design. His professional alter ego enjoys reaching people through social media and sharing knowledge through various educational outlets.
